name: Tag (Fraser Curry)
description:
This is more of a tech demo than a full game, I was just learning about finite state machines. You can view the Unity scripts on GitHub.

WASD or left joystick on any controller to move.

Last player standing wins in this simple game of tag.

The tagged player is darker and can pass the tag to another player by touching them.  When a player is tagged they will be momentarily forzen to all others to escape. While tagged your health will gradually decrease, however your speed will permenantly increase.

All assets created by me except for the font (Good Times), ice sfx (freeze and unfreeze) and music (menu and game).
